comment.author: 23093239@N06
comment._content: The Rolls-Royce shown is a Silver Ghost 40/50 h.p. with a body by Carrosserie Van den Plas in Brussels, chassisnr would be 138AUB, which was a renumbered chassis from TWO years before, originally 34RG, on test at the RR factory in September 1922, whilst the other AU series cars were 1924. The car was supplied to Mr. J.J. Rugeroni, who was the Rolls-Royce importer to Portugal, who had a good working relation with VandenPlas Brussels, as he ordered many other Rolls-Royce motor cars with bodies by them.

comment.realname: Biblioteca de Arte / Art Library Fundação Calouste Gulbenkian
